remarks: A complex number ` X ` is positive real iff ` X / ( 1 + X ) ` is in ` ( 0 (,) 1 ) ` .  Deduction form.  (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
statement:
xov1plusxeqvd.1 $e |- ( ph -> X e. CC ) $.
xov1plusxeqvd.2 $e |- ( ph -> X =/= -u 1 ) $.
xov1plusxeqvd $p |- ( ph -> ( X e. RR+ <-> ( X / ( 1 + X ) ) e. ( 0 (,) 1 ) ) ) $.
